fields.name: Killing Ability:
fields.value:
-Choose a player to hypnotize, and choose a target. The hypnotized player will attack the target with one higher level of attack than they would normally have. The hypnotized player will be roleblocked, but will not be told so, and they will get notified as if their action had succeeded.
Non-Killing Abilities:
-Charm a player.
-Redirect any number of your Charmed players.
